entries.title: American History X
entries.description: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

entries.title: Catch Me If You Can
entries.description: The true story of Frank Abagnale Jr. who, before his 19th birthday, successfully conned millions of dollars' worth of checks as a Pan Am pilot, doctor, and legal prosecutor.

entries.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
entries.description: Captain Barbossa, Will Turner and Elizabeth Swann must sail off the edge of the map, navigate treachery and betrayal, find Jack Sparrow, and make their final alliances for one last decisive battle.

entries.title: Crash
entries.description: Los Angeles citizens with vastly separate lives collide in interweaving stories of race, loss and redemption.

entries.title: WALLÂ·E
entries.description: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

entries.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
entries.description: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

entries.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
entries.description: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous hotel from the fictional Republic of Zubrowka between the first and second World Wars, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy who becomes his most trusted friend.

entries.title: Once Upon a Time in America
entries.description: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

entries.title: V for Vendetta
entries.description: In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow it with the help of a young woman.

entries.title: Gattaca
entries.description: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

entries.title: The Impossible
entries.description: The story of a tourist family in Thailand caught in the destruction and chaotic aftermath of the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.

entries.title: Chinatown
entries.description: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption and murder.

entries.title: Spirited Away
entries.description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

entries.title: Interstellar
entries.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

entries.title: Sin City
entries.description: A film that explores the dark and miserable town, Basin City, and tells the story of three different people, all caught up in violent corruption.

entries.title: Shrek
entries.description: After his swamp is filled with magical creatures, an ogre agrees to rescue a princess for a villainous lord in order to get his land back.

entries.title: Avengers: Endgame
entries.description: After half of all life is snapped away by Thanos, the Avengers are left scattered and divided. Now with a way to reverse the damage, the Avengers and their allies must assemble once more and learn to put differences aside in order to work together and set things right.

entries.title: Ex Machina
entries.description: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a breath-taking humanoid A.I.

entries.title: The Martian
entries.description: An astronaut becomes stranded on Mars after his team assume him dead, and must rely on his ingenuity to find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.

entries.title: No Country for Old Men
entries.description: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

entries.title: Scarface
entries.description: In Miami in 1980, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

entries.title: Black Swan
entries.description: A committed dancer wins the lead role in a production of Tchaikovsky's "Swan Lake" only to find herself struggling to maintain her sanity.

entries.title: Inception
entries.description: A thief, who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

entries.title: The Silence of the Lambs
entries.description: A young F.B.I. cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer who skins his victims.

entries.title: Pulp Fiction
entries.description: The lives of two mob hit men, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

entries.title: Rear Window
entries.description: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbours from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

entries.title: Shutter Island
entries.description: In 1954, a U.S. marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderess who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

entries.title: Reservoir Dogs
entries.description: After a simple jewelry heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

entries.title: The Great Beauty
entries.description: Jep Gambardella has seduced his way through the lavish nightlife of Rome for decades, but after his 65th birthday and a shock from the past, Jep looks past the nightclubs and parties to find a timeless landscape of absurd, exquisite beauty.

entries.title: The Truman Show
entries.description: An insurance salesman/adjuster discovers his entire life is actually a television show.
